example.en: Put a drop of food coloring in the container.

example.en: And he invented the shipping container.

example.en: Keep them in their original containers so that they are clearly identified.

example.en: I ran the manifests on all these shipping containers that you see here.

example.en: There's an explosion containment unit next to the river in Bercy.

example.en: You went to a bar to get a container for his ashes?
example.vi: Em tới quán bar để kiếm một cái lọ đựng hài cốt?

example.en: There are two containers full of gasoline in the garage.
example.vi: Có 2 thùng chứa đầy xăng trong garage đấy.

example.en: So it involves the shipping of the containers from one place to another.

example.en: There's a container underneath that's collecting that tissue.

example.en: Consider bringing a container of water to use as a visual aid.
example.vi: Hãy cân nhắc việc mang đến một bình chứa nước để dùng làm dụng cụ trợ huấn bằng hình ảnh.
